overview: Steve Cakebread served as the president and chief strategy officer of salesforce.com, a customer relationship management service provider, from February 2008 to January 2009 and as salesforce.com’s executive vice president and chief financial officer from May 2002 to February 2008. From April 1997 until April 2002, Steve served as senior vice president and chief financial officer at Autodesk, a software company. From April 1992 until April 1997, he was vice president of finance for Silicon Graphics World Trade. Previous to that Steve held various roles at Hewlett Packard. Steve holds a B.S. in business from the University of California at Berkeley and an M.B.A. from Indiana University.
